template<TGene >
int GeneticAlgorithm.Chromosome< TGene >.CompareTo ( Chromosome< TGene >  otherChromosome  ) 

Compares the current chromosome with another chromosome.

Parameters:
otherChromosome A chromosome to compare with this chromosome.
Returns:
Less than zero if this chromosome is less than the otherChromosome (this chromosome is less fit than the otherChromosome), zero if this chromosome equals the otherChromosome (this chromosome and the otherChromosome are equally fit), and greater than zero if this chromosome is more than the otherChromosome (this chromosome is fitter than the otherChromosome).
